Delete:
assign txo_rotate_dis_tlc = c0_txo_rotate_dis | c1_txo_rotate_dis |
			       c2_txo_rotate_dis | c3_txo_rotate_dis;
Add:

   input             c1_clk_in; // clock of the core
   input             c2_clk_in; // clock of the core
   input             c3_clk_in; // clock of the core
